name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidebar Bookmarks - Privacy Bookmarks, bookmark sync

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Includes features such as private bookmarks, import and export, encrypted synchronization and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The sidebar bookmark plugin offers the following features:

ğŸ†• Privacy bookmarks support folder management

â­ï¸ Browser bookmark encryption synchronization: Support cross-browser encryption synchronization of bookmarks to protect information security.

â­ï¸ Convenient Sidebar: Easily access and manage your bookmarks for a more efficient browsing experience.

â­ï¸ Privacy Bookmark Feature: Hide sensitive bookmarks to ensure your browsing privacy, displaying them only when needed to protect personal information.

â­ï¸ Import/Export Privacy Bookmarks: Conveniently manage your bookmarks by easily importing or exporting privacy bookmarks, giving you complete control over your data.

â­ï¸ Encrypted Synchronization of Privacy Bookmarks: Securely sync privacy bookmarks across different devices, allowing you to access your bookmark library anytime without worrying about privacy leaks.

â­ï¸ Pinned Bookmarks: Quickly access frequently used webpages with the pinned bookmarks feature, ensuring you can always find your favorite sites.

â­ï¸ Recently Visited: Easily view webpages youâ€™ve recently visited for quick returns.

â­ï¸ Most Visited: Automatically records the websites you visit most often, helping you quickly find commonly used resources.

â­ï¸ Recently Added: Conveniently view newly added bookmarks for quick organization and management.

â­ï¸ Search Function: Quickly find bookmarks using keywords, enhancing search efficiency.

By installing this plugin, you will be able to quickly find the webpages you need, enhancing your browsing experience and saving time. Whether for work or leisure, your browsing will become smoother and more efficient.

Two ways to open the extension sidebar:
1. Click the extension icon. You need to "pin" the extension to the browser toolbar.
2. Use the shortcut key. You can set the shortcut key by yourself chrome://extensions/shortcutsï¼ŒDefault is "Alt+B".
